com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.client

Interface LocalLoggerListener


  • public interface LocalLoggerListener
    Listener for local logger states.

    This interface contains callbacks representing the various states of the local logger that implementations can act upon.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void localLoggerChanged(LoggerCoordinates coordinates, LoggerMetadata metadata, MountedState mounted)
      Invoked when local logger properties have been changed.
      void localLoggerChanged(LoggerCoordinates coordinates, String errorDescription)
      Invoked when local logger properties have been changed resulting in an error.
      void localLoggerGone(LoggerCoordinates coordinates)
      Invoked when a local logger is removed from the local persistence store.
      void newLocalLogger(LoggerCoordinates coordinates, LoggerMetadata metadata, MountedState mounted)
      Invoked when a new local logger is scanned in from the local persistence store.
      void newLocalLogger(LoggerCoordinates coordinates, String errorDescription)
      Invoked when a new local logger in error is scanned in from the local persistence store.

    • Method Detail

      • newLocalLogger

        void newLocalLogger(LoggerCoordinates coordinates,
                    LoggerMetadata metadata,
                    MountedState mounted)
        Invoked when a new local logger is scanned in from the local persistence store.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - Unique coordinates identifying the local logger.
        metadata - The value of the stored metadata.
        mounted - The value of the locally stored MountedState flag.

      • newLocalLogger

        void newLocalLogger(LoggerCoordinates coordinates,
                    String errorDescription)
        Invoked when a new local logger in error is scanned in from the local persistence store.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - Unique coordinates identifying the local logger.
        errorDescription - The error description.

      • localLoggerChanged

        void localLoggerChanged(LoggerCoordinates coordinates,
                        LoggerMetadata metadata,
                        MountedState mounted)
        Invoked when local logger properties have been changed.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - Unique coordinates identifying the local logger.
        metadata - The value of the stored metadata.
        mounted - The value of the locally stored MountedState flag.

      • localLoggerChanged

        void localLoggerChanged(LoggerCoordinates coordinates,
                        String errorDescription)
        Invoked when local logger properties have been changed resulting in an error.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - Unique coordinates identifying the local logger.
        errorDescription - The error description.

      • localLoggerGone

        void localLoggerGone(LoggerCoordinates coordinates)
        Invoked when a local logger is removed from the local persistence store.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - Unique coordinates identifying the local logger.
